price: I found a woman[6] ruling over them, who has been given of all things, and she has a great throne.
arabic: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: [6] Known as Bilqīs, the Queen of Sheba.
